title: Promocodeudo
author: Promocodeudo
content: Setting out to a destination doesn't mean that we must surely get there as planned or on scheduled, note we might encounter and obstruction, there might also be a temporal setback on the way which may either delay us for some hours or even make us to go back to where we are coming from in other to continue the journey another day or still placing the movement on hold for some months to allow the situation that led to the cancellation of the journey to be put in control before re-embarking on the journey again as the case may be, but we can figure out a means that will help us to reach where we are going or replan on how to get there later without giving up on this mission and this is achievable by putting up a good strategic plan to complete the unfinished journey or mission despite what comes our way again. Relating this to our natural life, for us to make our destiny a fulfilment we may encounter obstacles which might even discourage us but it take endurance, extra focus, energy, and the happiness that comes with knowing where you are heading to, the purpose of what you are doing, and what to benefit on reaching their. In summary we have to work hard to make our destiny a reality no matter the obstacles we encounter on the way of making it happen, it is better to try than not trying because no risk most times leads to regret.What's your take?

comments.author: Wiwo
comments.body: The fact is that, there is always a difference between plan and reality same with dreams and realities and some with what you said, because you have a mapped-out plan for execution doesn't mean the whole process of getting it done must follow your planned pattern so there is no point in bordering yourself so much why this happens because that is the reality of things, there don't happen the way we. Planned them, but the most. The important thing Is That,  regardless of the part and process, it is good enough to arrive at Our expected result in the long run. So trust the process and do your part, the outcome won't be different from what you expect, but then the process may change but not the result

comments.author: Hispo
comments.created_time: May 13, 2023, 12:55:39 AMLast edit: May 13, 2023, 01:12:41 AM by Hispo
comments.body: I see it this way: In life there are two kind of things. Stuff we can't control and those we can control. We cannot control or choose our family, we are supposed to embrace them and learn how to live together.However, the things we can control are those we are supposed to take advantage of as much as possible to get to be happy. I have seen stories on internet of people who are born with serious conditions and deformities and yet, they took what they can control and decide to be happy with it. At least, that is the way I see it. Destiny is real or not depending whom you ask, some misuse the concept of destiny to project their entitled way of thinking, tho

comments.author: Free Market Capitalist
comments.body: Quote from: Promocodeudo on May 12, 2023, 08:24:29 PMWhat's your take?My take is that the idea of destiny is outdated. It made more sense in a Newtonian conception of the world where a Creator made the rules of the world and when he set it to work, he did it precisely like a Newtonian clock without leaving degrees of freedom in the system. Whoever knew the causes could calculate the effects.

comments.author: sunsilk
comments.body: There's destiny but we're the one that's making it as well. If you're destined to be rich someday then do you think that you'll be one if you don't do anything like working hard, investing or even betting on the lottery?So, if it means that if there's a fixed destiny I'd say there is. But, we have also control over that destiny so it's flexible based on how we do things in our current lives.

comments.author: OgNasty
comments.body: They say that time isn’t linear, which would mean that everything that will happen has already happened. However, there are also those who believe in alternate realities where everything that can happen does happen. Recently I spoke with someone about this subject who was talking about choosing your own reality. He thought your decisions don’t make your destiny, but rather transfer you into the universe of your outcome. It was an interesting conversation.

comments.author: swogerino
comments.body: I will only say a wise word from a country where I live from some years now and in here I have heard a lot of old people when advising young people that yes you should be preparing well,going to school,finding a good job going and learn a new skill,all things that can help make your life/destiny better but the best word or phrase I have heard from here is "May luck work on you rather than the body work for you" and this is a great saying meaning that if luck is not by your side you can do anything and you will not be successful at all compared to if luck was by your side.This saying has truly put me into deep thinking and I don't know what to think about it but mostly these old people are right in my opinion.

comments.body: Quote from: Promocodeudo on May 12, 2023, 08:24:29 PMIn summary we have to work hard to make our destiny a reality no matter the obstacles we encounter on the way of making it happen, it is better to try than not trying because no risk most times leads to regret.What's your take?Destiny is what many people believe it is already written and cannot be altered by anyone again. Some people believe that no matter how hard you try and work so hard to make a difference in your life of becoming a better and wealthy person, you can’t achieve that above which was already destined for you. If you look at this statement or the belief of the people in this statement, it can only lead to discouragement and total disappointment to people that are finding it hard to make a living in this world. Another fact we should be aware of is that, maybe it is as destined that you’ll have to put that effort before you can see the result of your hard work, this now looks more encouraging again. The fact that we can’t tell the future of what we’re going to become or what we’ll achieve in this life is what makes it fascinating and a world full of hardworking people trying to make ends meet. If we all know what we’ll become and destined to achieve in this life, we would have been off the hardwork and physical skills that’s enhancing the development of the world by now.

comments.author: Iadegbola34
comments.body: Life is full of uncertainties, and the journey towards our goals and destinations is rarely a straight path. We may encounter obstacles, setbacks, and unexpected circumstances that challenge our plans. However, it is crucial not to lose sight of our mission and keep a positive mindset.It's important to acknowledge that reaching our desired destination may not always happen according to our initial schedule or as smoothly as we hope. We might face temporary setbacks that require us to adjust our plans, take detours, or even pause temporarily. Nevertheless, this doesn't mean we should give up on our goals and dreams.Instead, it's vital to embrace resilience, endurance, and an unwavering focus on the purpose and benefits of reaching our destination. We must be willing to adapt, replan, and develop strategic approaches to overcome the obstacles in our path. This might involve seeking alternative routes, gathering additional resources, or acquiring new skills.
